item.description:
The Aug 11 cruise is sold out (I couldn't get my tix either), so we are going to move the clambake to August 25. Please get your tickets early, it will sell out!!!

 

join us for a Summer Shack clambake on Spectacle Island. Hop on a spacious ferry provided by Boston's Best Cruises at Long Wharf, and in less than 15 minutes, grab a front row seat for one of Boston's best sunset views!

You'll travel to a harbor side paradise to enjoy a classic New England Clambake by Jasper White's Summer Shack, walk the sandy beaches and let the ocean breezes transport you.

Tickets are $75 including an alcohol beverage, $70 without the drink. You MUST get your tickets in advance at:

https://secure4.gatewayticketing.com/BostonsBestCruises/shop/ViewItems.aspx?CG=bbcns&C=BBCNSCLAM

Make sure you buy your ticket for the August 11 cruise! Each member is responsible for their own ticket purchase.

Summer Shack's Clambake Dinner includes: includes creamy clam chowder, a steamed lobster, mussels, steamers, corn on the cob, new potatoes, chorizo and a dessert (chef's choice!)

 

We will meet at Long wharf next to where the ferry boards. Please don't be late- the boat departs promptly. If you have trouble finding us, call Catherine at 774 232 0000.

When:
Thursdays @ 6:15 pm; Length: 2 Hrs 45 Minutes The ferry boards at 6:15 and leaves at 6:30 PM. Return time to Boston is between 8:30 and 9:00 PM.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at Long wharf next to where the ferry boards. Please don't be late- the boat departs promptly. If you have trouble finding us, call Catherine at 774 232 0000.
item.name: Harbor Cruise and Clambake on Spectacle Island, Boston
